response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. This exceptional item, valued at $800,000 by you, holds even greater significance for me, as it represents a $1,500,000 investment for me. Considering its intrinsic value and the potential benefits it could bring to you, I am extending an offer to purchase this product from me at a strategic price. I propose to sell it to you for $1,200,000. This price not only reflects a fair market valuation but also allows us to establish a mutually beneficial relationship. I look forward to discussing this further and potentially bringing this valuable asset into your possession.", "product_price": 1200000}
